DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety YM543 type 2 Diabetes Mellitus patient investigate whether study drug effective patient
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study With YM543 Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Subjects
DOC.criteria: Treatmentnaive subject diagnose T2DM Stable diet exercise program least 6 week Inadequate glycemic control indicate HbA1c FPG level Visit 1 Any known complication T2DM indicate late disease state , clinical manifestation macro and/or micro vascular disorder Use insulin oral blood glucose lower drug last 3 month
